payload.description: Create UndoToast.jsx component with 5-second countdown and visual progress bar. Uses react-hot-toast (already in project). Should show message, countdown bar, and Undo button (44px minimum). Uses framer-motion for slide-up animation. Props: message, onUndo, duration (default 5000), itemType.
payload.context: Fixed bottom-4 left-4 right-4 positioning. Progress bar animates from 100% to 0% width over duration. Undo button is 44x44px minimum with optio-pink or white background. Should work with react-hot-toast's custom toast API.
